sentences.sentence: This is nonrefundable, even if the source of the mineral is less prevalent than the lessee predicted it to be or if it is in an unextractable form.
sentences.translation: 即使矿源比承租人预测的要少，或者矿源是不可开采的形式，这也是不可退还的。

sentences.sentence: Nonrefundable Service Fee, Nonrefundable Paper Ticket Fee, Nonrefundable Delivery Charge.
sentences.translation: 不可退票服务费，不可退票纸门票费，工作日运送费用。
